meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of the United States, Canada, Australia, and other countries.
meanings.sent1: I found five dollars on the street.
meanings.sent2: She paid for the toy with ten dollars.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny dollars.
meanings.sent4: His words were worth more than a million dollars.
meanings.sent5: The jar overflowed with colorful dollars.

meanings.definition: A coin or note representing one dollar.
meanings.sent1: He dropped a few dollars into the charity box.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepted dollar bills.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the dollar disappear and reappear.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright dollar in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The child's eyes lit up when he saw the shiny dollar.
